name: Gunship - Death from Above
description:
Gunship operator game
Rain bullets and explosives on to ant like enemies below

Current features
- dismemberment

-ai that runs around
- convoy trucks carrying ai

- ten shoot em up levels

- destructible trees

- small resource style prep screen

- combat rating system (maybe broken, no saves between sessions)

Future maybes
- anti air and flares (currently made but not refined)
- friendlies fighting enemies below, assist scenarios (currently made but not refined)
- enemies taking cover from gunship and friendly fire (currently made but not refined)
- civilians scenarios
- radio chatter
- planning stage that allows the player to set their own gunship path
- more layered ai, ex. crawling, tripping, bleeding

Controls

Mouse - look
Mouse wheel - zoom
Left click - shoot
W - faster
S - slower
F - flare
1, 2, 3 - switch fire mode ( 20mm, 40mm etc.)
Escape - kicks to main menu
L - end mission early
